TopicTitle: Hi, I'm Wofwood, and my username is a typo.

Articles.Content:
I meant to register under Wolfwood, the literal machine-gun preacher from the seinen anime Trigun, but instead, I typed "Wofwood", which is... nothing. I'm reporting my own post for this one-time request for staff help... please change my username to Wolfwood. If that's not available, I'll accept DestyNova, NickDWolfwood, or Kagame.

Alright, now that's out of the way...

I'm a recent transplant from the Minecraft community, so it's quite refreshing to see proper English once again. Other than KSP, I play FreeFallTournament (think Mario Universe meets Unreal Tournament), various Flash games, and the occasional RPG. I'm into anime, movies, sci-fi, whatever.

Most of what I do in KSP is Sandbox mode lately, because I am decidedly crap at running a kerbal space program. However, I seem to have developed an affinity for making KSP models of German Wunderwaffe, or wonder weapons. Think V-1 and V-2. Except I've never produced a flyable V-1 (though I haven't tried with FAR), and can't be bothered to make a V-2 because it's just... a rocket. Kind of boring, honestly. Instead, I focus on the more obscure things. I've produced a (barely) flyable Silbervogel (albeit only flyable without FAR) and am in the midst of producing a flyable Horten H.XVIII bomber... that I accidentally labeled as a Gotha Go229, a much smaller fighter. *shakes head at own idiocy* The most successful Wunderwaffen I've built yet is a stock copy of the AMW A-10, which went halfway around Kerbin on one stage, even when flown by a butterfingered pilot such as me. All I can say is von Braun most definitely knew what he was doing. However, I'll save the details for a really big forum post later, as you probably don't want to hear the gory details of my current obsession right now. =P

In Career Mode, the best I've done is crash into the moon once. I also achieved solar orbit, twice, but the second one went all Icarus on me, so... yeah. Even with MechJeb, I am a horrid pilot.

Anyways, that's all for now.

*peace*

Welcome to the Squad forums Wofwood Kagame, I'll change your name but do be aware it'll change your login name too

Edit:

Eh it seems someone beat you to the name, sorry :/

Which of the others do you like most?

Edited April 24, 2015 by sal_vager

I'll go ahead and list them in order of priority.

1. Kagame

2. DestyNova

3. EduardKagame

That should do ya. Thanks!

Welcome Kagame! I trust you will enjoy the forums.

Happy landings!

Sweet. Kagame's almost always taken so i'm suprised I got it XD

@Kaname: Two posts in and I find my people. Yo.

@Starhawk: Thanks!
